      • checkPackageBasedOnFiles

        public boolean checkPackageBasedOnFiles()
                                 throws Exception
        Checks the package consistency based on actual files present in package the on the file system. For every file in the packagePath, a checksum will be computed. Also a corresponding mets:FLocat element will be extracted and the expected checksum will be compared to the computed one.
        Returns:
        true if a corresponding FLocat element could be found for every file and the checksums matched, otherwise false
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • checkPackageBasedOnMets

        public boolean checkPackageBasedOnMets()
                                throws Exception
        Checks the package consistency based on the File elements in the METS file. This assumes that a file must exist for every File element, which is not the case for delta-packages.
        Returns:
        true, if a file could be found for every File element and the checksums matched, otherwise false
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

        the messages
